Further, President @realDonaldTrump directed his Center for Medicare and Medicaid Services to issue a broad range of temporary regulation waivers and new rules to give the health care system the flexibility to rapidly increase treatment capacity.  (4/7)

They said our hospitals would be overrun. President Trump mobilized the Army Corps of Engineers to rapidly build emergency field hospitals and retrofit convention centers to provide thousands of extra hospital beds. Thankfully, most of them never saw a single patient.  (3/7)
